metadata.title: CVE-2017-18224 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel before 4.15, fs/ocfs2/aops.c omits use of a semaphoreand consequently has a race condition for access to the extent tree duringread operations in DIRECT mode, which allows local users to cause a denialof service (BUG) by modifying a certain e_cpos field.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18224` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-24-generic - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
linux-image-4.15.0-24-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
linux-image-4.15.0-24-lowlatency - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-24-generic - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-24-lowlatency - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1013-azure - 4.15.0-1013.13~16.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1014-gcp - 4.15.0-1014.14~16.04.1
No subscription required
